column4: I see whenever I reboot PC. how can I fix this? http://ompldr.org/vYm1oMQ
change your stored configuration?
how can I change it?
probably you have a video driver that have a gui
how can I fix this problem?
did you install a video driver recently?
yes nvidia gtx580 driver
is there a gui for the driver?
there is nvidia utility for setting display
try changing the resolution from there.
change the resolution to 1920x1080
now it was set Auto
change it and reboot
ok but when I changed it, the system is working slow
i don't know why and it automatically changed as Auto
oh.. do you know what resolution it is now?
now it is Auto.
there is no slow performance.
take a screenshot and check its resolution
but if I try to change it , the system will be slow.
take a screenshot(printscreen) save the picture, right click it -> properties -> image
